name: Gifts For The Grandkids
description:
Ignore the error message about the HTML-version!!
PLAY: HERE!

Its the day before Christmas and you don't have any gifts for your grand kids! Time to raid the shops for those Forknifes and EggsBox 360 that them kids like. But there aren't many gifts left in stock and people will try to steal you stuffs before you pay! Buy the gifts! Protect your cart

and SAVE CHRISTMAS!

This is a arcade type shooter. Its up to 4 players coop (requires 4 controllers such as XBOX, PS or compatible).

Controls:

Move: Left Stick / WASD
Aim: Right Stick / Mouse
Shoot: RB / LMB
Pickup items/cart: E / B/Red
Change Weapon: F / Y/Yellow

This game is made as part of Yogscast game jam 2019.

Programming and and gameplay design: Nklobe / Squidishhead
Art and sound: Alexander Hjelm
